titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to withholding certain city or county taxes from the pay of Federal employees.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, OPM.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 4/23/1987--Introduced. Removes the prohibition on withholding, without the employees' consent, city or county taxes from the pay of a Federal employee who is not a resident of, or whose regular place of Federal employment is not within, the State in which such city or county is located.
